text.autoconfig.aaproxy.title: AAProxy
text.autoconfig.aaproxy.option.globalEna: proxy toggle - IF THIS IS OFF NOTHING WILL HAPPEN!
text.autoconfig.aaproxy.option.proxySing: AATool works for singleplayer directly, but if for some reason you wanted to you could turn this on
text.autoconfig.aaproxy.option.roProxyFo: (READ ONLY) This is the folder to use for 'Track Specific World' in AATool
